data.title: Guadalcanal Diary Original 1943 French Grande Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1943 French grande poster by Boris Grinsson for the film Guadalcanal Diary directed by Lewis Seiler with Preston Foster / Lloyd Nolan / William Bendix / Richard Conte.
data.text:
